DOC.brief_title: Bone Status on Patients With Genetic Hemochromatosis: a 3 Years Descriptive and Evolutionary Study
DOC.detailed_description: Bone diseases have been recognized recently as complications of genetic hemochromatosis. Further studies are needed to describe the role of iron in bone injuries. The purpose of this study is to describe bone status on patients with genetical hemochromatosis, at diagnostic time and his evolution under treatment.
